  mutate(babysex = as.character(babysex), babysex = case_when(babysex == 1 ~ "male", babysex == 2 ~ "female" )) %>%
  mutate(frace = as.character(frace),

      frace == 1 ~ "White", 
      frace == 2 ~ "Black",

      frace == 8 ~ "Other",
      frace == 9 ~ "Unknown"
